original_text: So the people took the man outside the camp. They threw stones at him until he died. That was what the Lord had told Moses to do.
korean_text: 온 회중이 곧 그를 진영 밖으로 끌어내고 돌로 그를 쳐죽여서 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 하니라

sentences.original_text: So the people took the man outside the camp
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 사람들은 그 남자를 진 밖으로 데려갔습니다

sentences.original_text: That was what the Lord had told Moses to do
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 주께서 모세에게 하라고 말씀하신 것이었습니다
